title: New Xencelabs Pen Display 24 Available
description: We've added a Xencelabs Pen Display 24 to our lab for student use.
moreInfo: The Xencelabs Pen Display 24 provides a high-quality, responsive drawing experience with a 4K display, customizable buttons, and precision stylus support. Students can now access this new device during lab hours for their digital art projects. Check it out to experience improved control and accuracy!

title: Upgrade: Five New ProArt Monitors Installed
description: Our lab is now equipped with five ASUS ProArt Monitors to enhance your design work.
moreInfo: The new ASUS ProArt Monitors provide color-accurate displays with factory calibration, HDR support, and an array of color settings. These monitors are ideal for graphic design students focusing on detailed color work and professional-level projects. Feel free to use these in the lab to see your designs come to life with vibrant color accuracy!
